page.title: 01Farmlandd in Sth Ayrshire
page.content: The land cover of this block is predominantly farmland extending from the raised beaches along the shoreline to no more than 200 feet on the inland hills. Cattle and/or sheep graze the hedgerow bounded fields, with early Ayrshire potatoes a maian crop on any cultivated ground. Features within the area are Grangestone Industrial Estate which has around a dozen factories including several nest factories. Products include whisky. jersey fabbric, machinery, chocolate crumb, reed switches and dental and surgical garments. Various small industries are run in the nest factories, soft toys,printing and car repairs. In the n.w. of the area is the kelco/Ail factory which produces Alginate from seaweed. In the SSE of the area stand 16th Century Killochan Castle.
